title: Kelly M. Burke
text:
Kelly M. Burke is a <a href="Democratic%20Party%20%28United%20States%29">Democratic</a> member of the <a href="Illinois%20House%20of%20Representatives">Illinois House of Representatives</a>, representing the 36th District since January 2011. The 36th District includes all or parts of the <a href="Beverly%2C%20Chicago">Beverly</a>, <a href="Mount%20Greenwood%2C%20Chicago">Mount Greenwood</a> and <a href="Auburn%20Gresham%2C%20Chicago">Auburn-Gresham</a> neighborhoods in the City of Chicago as well as the all or parts of the surrounding suburbs of <a href="Oak%20Lawn%2C%20Illinois">Oak Lawn</a>, <a href="Evergreen%20Park%2C%20Illinois">Evergreen Park</a>, <a href="Chicago%20Ridge%2C%20Illinois">Chicago Ridge</a>, <a href="Hometown%2C%20Illinois">Hometown</a> and <a href="Palos%20Hills%2C%20Illinois">Palos Hills</a>.
She is currently the Chairwoman of the Higher Education Committee in the 99th General Assembly. She also serves Agriculture & Conservation, Health Care Licenses, Higher Education Appropriations, Tollway Oversight, Labor & Commerce and Tollway Oversight.
